column1: **Scale - Determines allocations of resources across (Food, Energy, Housing, Clothing, Consumer Goods, Absolute necessities (oxygen/water), Services, Savings/Investment) for Society (Agriculture, Utilities, Construction, Trade, Manufactured goods, Government, Professional services, Finance, Edu Health Social, Arts, Other, Mining, Information, Transportation and warehousing
**Relative Wealth - guesstimated with plot points between starving and wealthy, should probably round to 2 digits, way too sure here
**Historical Gini - https://ourworldindata.org/income-inequality very rough and generalized, probably bad history on its own, major issues within and without a nation
